00041    /*
00042    * Add a subfactory to the list of children, and set communicator (if any).
00043    */
00044    void PairFactory::addSubfactory(PairFactory& subfactory)
00045    {  subfactories_.push_back(&subfactory); }
00046 
00047    /*
00048    * Return a pointer to a new McPairInteration, if possible.
00049    */
00050    McPairPotential* 
00051    PairFactory::mcFactory(const std::string& name, System& system) const
00052    {
00053       McPairPotential* ptr = 0;
00054 
00055       // Try subfactories first
00056       ptr = tryMcSubfactories(name, system);
00057       if (ptr) return ptr;
00058 
00059       if (name == "LJPair") {
00060          ptr = new McPairPotentialImpl<LJPair>(system);
00061       } else
00062       if (name == "DpdPair") {
00063          ptr = new McPairPotentialImpl<DpdPair>(system);
00064       } else
00065       if (name == "CompensatedPair<DpdPair,FeneBond>") {
00066          ptr = new McPairPotentialImpl< CompensatedPair<DpdPair, FeneBond> >(system);
00067       }
00068       return ptr;
00069    }
00070 
00071    /*
00072    * Return a pointer to a new MdPairPotential, if possible.
00073    */
00074    MdPairPotential* 
00075    PairFactory::mdFactory(const std::string& name, System& system) const
00076    {
00077       MdPairPotential* ptr = 0;
00078 
00079       // Try subfactories first
00080       ptr = tryMdSubfactories(name, system);
00081       if (ptr) return ptr;
00082 
00083       if (name == "LJPair") {
00084          ptr = new MdPairPotentialImpl<LJPair>(system);
00085       } else
00086       if (name == "DpdPair") {
00087          ptr = new MdPairPotentialImpl<DpdPair>(system);
00088       } else
00089       if (name == "CompensatedPair<DpdPair,FeneBond>") {
00090          ptr = new MdPairPotentialImpl< CompensatedPair<DpdPair, FeneBond> >(system);
00091       }
00092       return ptr;
00093    }
00094 
00095    /*
00096    * Convert an McPairPotential to a MdPairPotential, if possible.
00097    */
00098    MdPairPotential* 
00099    PairFactory::mdFactory(McPairPotential& potential) const
00100    {
00101       std::string name = potential.interactionClassName();
00102       MdPairPotential* ptr = 0;
00103 
00104       // Try subfactories first
00105       ptr = tryMdSubfactories(potential);
00106       if (ptr) return ptr;
00107 
00108       if (name == "LJPair") {
00109          McPairPotentialImpl<LJPair>* mcPtr 
00110              = dynamic_cast< McPairPotentialImpl<LJPair>* >(&potential);
00111          ptr = new MdPairPotentialImpl<LJPair>(*mcPtr);
00112       } else
00113       if (name == "DpdPair") {
00114          McPairPotentialImpl<DpdPair>* mcPtr 
00115              = dynamic_cast< McPairPotentialImpl<DpdPair>* >(&potential);
00116          ptr = new MdPairPotentialImpl<DpdPair>(*mcPtr);
00117       } else 
00118       if (name == "CompensatedPair<DpdPair,FeneBond>") {
00119          McPairPotentialImpl< CompensatedPair<DpdPair, FeneBond> >* mcPtr 
00120              = dynamic_cast< McPairPotentialImpl< CompensatedPair<DpdPair, FeneBond> >* >(&potential);
00121          ptr = new MdPairPotentialImpl< CompensatedPair<DpdPair, FeneBond> >(*mcPtr);
00122       }
00123       return ptr;
00124    }
00125 
00126    /*
00127    * Try all subfactories in sequence searching for a match.
00128    */
00129    McPairPotential* 
00130    PairFactory::tryMcSubfactories(const std::string& className, System& system) const
00131    {
00132       McPairPotential* typePtr = 0;
00133       int n = subfactories_.size();
00134       for (int i = 0; i < n && typePtr == 0; ++i) {
00135          typePtr = subfactories_[i]->mcFactory(className, system);
00136       }
00137       return typePtr;
00138    }
00139 
00140    /*
00141    * Try all subfactories in sequence searching for a match.
00142    */
00143    MdPairPotential* 
00144    PairFactory::tryMdSubfactories(const std::string& className, System& system) const
00145    {
00146       MdPairPotential* typePtr = 0;
00147       int n = subfactories_.size();
00148       for (int i = 0; i < n && typePtr == 0; ++i) {
00149          typePtr = subfactories_[i]->mdFactory(className, system);
00150       }
00151       return typePtr;
00152    }
00153 
00154    /*
00155    * Try all subfactories in sequence searching for a match.
00156    */
00157    MdPairPotential* PairFactory::tryMdSubfactories(McPairPotential& potential) const
00158    {
00159       MdPairPotential* typePtr = 0;
00160       int n = subfactories_.size();
00161       for (int i = 0; i < n && typePtr == 0; ++i) {
00162          typePtr = subfactories_[i]->mdFactory(potential);
00163       }
00164       return typePtr;
00165    }
